author: arunhep
body:
# Summary of changes in Global Tags

## Upgrade

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics peak scenario** : [90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v19](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v19) as [90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v18](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v18) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v19/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_peak_v18):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html
      * HCAL Response Correction Update

   * **PhaseI 2017 cosmics scenario** : [90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v18](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v18) as [90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v17](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v17) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v18/90X_upgrade2017cosmics_realistic_deco_v17):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html
      * HCAL Response Correction Update

   * **PhaseI 2017 design scenario** : [90X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v19](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v19) as [90X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v18](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v18) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v19/90X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v18):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html
      * HCAL Response Correction Update

   * **PhaseI 2017 realistic scenario** : [90X_upgrade2017_realistic_v20](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017_realistic_v20) as [90X_upgrade2017_realistic_v19](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017_realistic_v19) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2017_realistic_v20/90X_upgrade2017_realistic_v19):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html
      * HCAL Response Correction Update

   * **PhaseI 2018 cosmics scenario** : [90X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v17](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v17) as [90X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v16](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v16) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v17/90X_upgrade2018cosmics_realistic_deco_v16):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html

   * **PhaseI 2018 design scenario** : [90X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v15](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v15) as [90X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v14](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v14) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v15/90X_upgrade2018_design_IdealBS_v14):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html

   * **PhaseI 2018 realistic scenario** : [90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v17](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v17) as [90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v16](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v16) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v17/90X_upgrade2018_realistic_v16):
      * Bug Fix in HCAL LUTs described here https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2860.html
title: 2017 and 2018 GTs updated with HCAL LUTs Bug fix and Resp Corr Update for Plan1
